FAQ / Wave 2 / Characters /
View On FortressMaximus.io

Dinobot Slug - Battering Ram

  1. If Slug attacks or defends more than once in a turn, will his ability work in each battle? [Source: WotC]
    Yes. The first white battle icon you flip for each battle will result in 3 extra cards rather than 2.
